title: Miniatures
description: In the process of writing my master’s thesis Exploratory Three Dimensional Cartographic Visualisation of Geolocated Datasets I developed a workflow to process map data and display it in vivid 3D. This experimental research looked to find novel and aesthetically engaging ways to visualise a variety of datasets, such as meteorite falls, geotagged social media data or seismic activity.

title: Somatia
description:
The World of Somatia is an ongoing fantasy worldbuilding project that grew from my homebrew tabletop roleplaying setting and the maps I created for it.

In order to interactively visualize and edit various locations, and their political and religious relationships, I developed an interactive 3D map inside of Unreal Engine, synced to an online Notion.so database.

With a mix of Blueprint and C++ coding, I am able to easily push and pull location data to and from the note-taking online application.

The 3D terrain was created in Gaea, with further editing and optimization in Blender and Houdini, and textured in Substance Painter. Shaders are used to achieve close-up texture detail and various animations and effects.

I was then able to create a narrated fly-through of the Northern Realms using the Unreal Sequencer, with post-processing in After Effects and DaVinci Resolve, and audio production in Adobe Audition.

The video also showcases 3D Printable Miniatures I have been sculpting in Zbrush and Blender.
seo: Worldbuilding Somatia: Interactive fantasy map-making for DnD & Tabletop RPG powered by Unreal Engine, Notion & Gaea.

title: Zefi
description:
Visit ze.fi

Ze.fi is an inclusive education platform, available in both English and Arabic, focused on decentralized finance, blockchain technologies, and cryptocurrencies.

I was tasked with developing a unique visual identity for the platform that would feel approachable, culturally relevant, and reflect the gamified aspects of the app.

Our client liked the idea of a mascot based on Middle Eastern folktale character Sinbad the Sailor, while integrating narrative elements and characters from the 1001 Nights into the 3D illustrations. The illustrations were based around the block(-chain) and rendered from an isometric perspective, the grid motif evoking Islamic geometric patterns.

I modelled, rigged, posed, and rendered all assets in Blender.
seo: Creating Ze.fi's visual identity, an inclusive crypto education platform for the Middle East, with 3D illustrations inspired by local folklore.

title: Zendetta
description:
Visit Zendetta.com

Award-winning interactive web experience illustrating Karam Alhamad's journey during the Syrian conflict using evocative visual storytelling.

An immersive, interactive WebGL experience. From student protestor through to war journalist, political detainee, refugee, and finally policy advocate, Karam’s story of survival and revolution is just one of millions like it as the Syrian conflict now spans over a decade.

Alongside the talented team of UI designers and developers at Psychoactive Studios, I had the privilege to work with Karam to retell his story. My main responsibilities were to develop the narrative and visual elements through storyboarding, UX design, illustrations, and animations. I also worked closely with Karam on the English script for the website, making sure to keep the narration clear and concise while preserving the authenticity and intimacy of his personal account.

The goal was to condense Karam’s story into a 10-minute interactive experience using visual storytelling to evoke feelings of passion, hope, and empathy. We aimed to shed light on not only his personal story, but the plight of thousands of Syrians who are currently arbitrarily detained by the Al-Assad regime.

Portraying such an intimate yet politically charged story in as accurate a manner as possible meant it was critical to conduct extensive research. While I was able to base a lot of the visuals off Karam’s own photos, videos, and first-hand accounts, I had to supplement my own research and reference gathering.

The site won awards from Awwwards, CSS Design Awards, FWA, Muse Creative Awards, and W3 Awards. Full list
seo: Designing Zendetta, an immersive, interactive web-experience. From political detainee to refugee and activist, a story of survival and revolution through the Syrian uprising.

title: Psychoactive
description:
I worked at Psychoactive Studios to bring to life immersive and interactive web experiences, with a focus on WebGL-powered 3D websites and narrative experiences such as:

Beyond Studio - Soul Aether - Talent Army - Zendetta

In my time as Art Director, I also took on Technical Artist responsibilities, working on Branding, 3D Modeling, UI/UX design, JavaScript & WebGL Development, Concept Art, Storyboarding, Illustration, and Animation. I leveraged my technical and development expertise to empower the studio's artistic vision and capabilities.

I also developed the studio’s Brand Identity and Strategy, basing the amphibian theme on the phyllomedusa bicolor psychoactive frog. This branding process included both tone of voice and visual elements such as the tadpole logo and a tessellated, animated frog pattern inspired by the works of M.C. Escher, using the metamorphosis of the frog as a metaphor for the studio’s development process.
seo: Bespoke brand and logo design, backed by a comprehensive brand identity, brand strategy and mesmerising motion graphics, illustration & animation.

title: Amphibians
description:
Visit psychoactiveamphibians.xyz

The Psychoactive Amphibians project is a generative world-building project focused on the breeding of amphibians inhabiting a fantasy swamp.

The webpage served as a showcase of Psychoactive Studio's WebGL capabilities.

I worked on the project both in an art direction & concept artist capacity as well as on the technical implementation, overseeing the 3D to web pipeline. I also had the opportunity to get hands-on with shader and three.js development, as well as hand-painting the environment textures.

Learned a lot from our incredibly talented 3D Character Artist Tales da Rocha.
seo: Bespoke brand and logo design, backed by a comprehensive brand identity, brand strategy and mesmerising motion graphics, illustration & animation.
